B

BaseMojo - Class in net.flybyte.virgo.maven
This class acts as a base class used to initialize all the parameters and configuration settings needed for executing the both groups of mojo implementations (server and deployer).
BaseMojo() - Constructor for class net.flybyte.virgo.maven.BaseMojo
 

C

closeConnector() - Method in class net.flybyte.virgo.maven.BaseMojo
Closes the JMXConnector object.

D
